DOC.brief_summary: Symptomatic and asymptomatic patients wearing Metal on Metal hip prosthesis will be enrolled in the study and periimplant pseudotumors will be searched by means of NMR (Nuclear Magnetic Resonance).
DOC.brief_title: The Effects of Large Head MoM Hip Prosthesis on Soft Tissue: Study With 3 Tesla NMR
DOC.criteria: Patients wearing MoM hip prosthesis Head >= 36 mm Presence of ferromagnetic implants and/or presence of clinical situations that are not compatible with NMR
